thread.title: Meryl Streep backs controversial Nirbhaya documentary 'India's Daughter' for Oscar nomination
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep backs controversial Nirbhaya documentary 'India's Daughter' for Oscar nomination - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Meryl Streep backs controversial Nirbhaya documentary 'India's Daughter' for Oscar nomination
text: A film banned by Indian authorities about the deadly rape of a young woman on a bus in New Delhi has opened in the United States to acclaim, with Hollywood star Meryl Streep saying it deserves to win an Academy Award. Â»
